item.title: Co-Enriching Microflora Associated with Culture Based Methods to Detect Salmonella from Tomato Phyllosphere
item.description: Andrea R. Ottesen, Antonio Gonzalez, Rebecca Bell, Caroline Arce, Steven Rideout, Marc Allard, Peter Evans, Errol Strain, Steven Musser, Rob Knight, Eric Brown, James B. Pettengill Link: http://journals.plos.org/plosone/article?id=10.1371/journal.pone.0073079 When: Friday, July 28 at 10:00AM Where: MIAEH conference room (SPH 2242CC) Abstract The ability to detect a specific organism from a complex environment is vitally important to many fields of public health, including food safety. For example, tomatoes have been implicated numerous times as vehicles of foodborne outbreaks due to strains of Salmonella but few studies have ever recovered Salmonella from a tomato phyllosphere environment.
